search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches splunk_server=local | fields title eai:acl.app disabled cron_schedule is_scheduled | where disabled=0 AND is_scheduled=1 | stats values(eai:acl.app) as app values(title) as title count by cron_schedule | sort - count
